const.name: TYPE_HTML
const.description: Describes the annotation of a document (HTML)

prop.name: document
prop.description: The document of the file being parsed

prop.name: filePath
prop.description: The filepath used to load the document.

method.name: __construct
method.description: Create a new instance of a DOMParser

method.name: create
method.description: Creates and returns a DOMElement with the specified tagName and the specified attributes

parameter.name: $tag
parameter.description: The element's tag

parameter.name: $content
parameter.description: The content of the element. It can be a string or a DOMElement.

parameter.name: $id
parameter.description: The element's id

parameter.name: $class
parameter.description: The element's class. Mostly for html elements

parameter.name: $query
parameter.description: The XPath query to be evaluated

parameter.name: $context
parameter.description: The base to act as root for the query

method.name: query

parameter.name: $query
parameter.description: The XPath query to be evaluated

parameter.name: $context
parameter.description: The base to act as root for the query

method.returndescription:
Returns a DOMNodeList containing all nodes matching the given XPath expression. An empty DOMNodeList, if XPath expression dont match anything.
Returns FALSE If the expression is malformed or the context is invalid.

method.name: find

parameter.name: $id
parameter.description: The id of the element

parameter.name: $nodeName
parameter.description: The nodename of the element. If not given, it searches all elements (*).

method.returndescription: Returns the node or NULL if the node doesn't exist.

parameter.name: $content
parameter.description: The comment content

method.name: import
method.description: Imports a node to this document

parameter.name: $node
parameter.description: The node to import

parameter.name: $deep
parameter.description: Defines whether all the children of this node will be imported

method.name: getHTML
method.description: Returns the HTML form of the document

parameter.name: $format
parameter.description: Indicates whether to format the output.

method.name: getXML
method.description: Returns the XML form of the document

parameter.name: $format
parameter.description: Indicates whether to format the output.

parameter.name: $path
parameter.description: The document path

parameter.name: $rootRelative
parameter.description: Indicates whether the path must be normalized in order to be root relative.

parameter.name: $preserve
parameter.description: Indicates whether the parser will preserve whitespaces during load

method.name: loadContent
method.description: Load source as HTML or XML

parameter.name: $source
parameter.description: The source code

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: The type of the content given

parameter.name: $options
parameter.description: Any options to pass to the loadHTML and loadXML functions.

method.name: save
method.description: Saves the file in the given filepath.

parameter.name: $path
parameter.description: The filepath

parameter.name: $fileName
parameter.description: The filename

parameter.name: $format
parameter.description: Indicator whether the parser will save formated xml or unformatted.

method.returndescription: True on success (logs bytes written) False elsewhere

method.name: update
method.description: Updates the file loaded before by the load() function.

parameter.name: $format
parameter.description: Indicator whether the parser will save formated xml or not.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.
